title: Live Updates: Supreme Court Weighs Future Role and Final Word on Abortion

sentence: The Battle Over Abortion More Florida governor signs bill banning protesting outside of homes Clarence Thomas says Supreme Court changed by leak of draft abortion opinion Thousands gather for pro-abortion rights protests across U.S. Sen. title: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis signs bill banning "picketing and protesting" outside a private residence
